query: query PersonPreviewCard($personId: Long!, $rolesLimit: Int = 10, $bestMoviesLimit: Int = 10) { person(id: $personId) { id poster { avatarsUrl fallbackUrl __typename } name originalName roles(limit: $rolesLimit, isCareer: true) { items { role { title { russian __typename } __typename } __typename } __typename } bestFilms: bestMovies(limit: $bestMoviesLimit, type: FILM) { ...PersonPreviewCardBestMovies __typename } bestSeries: bestMovies(limit: $bestMoviesLimit, type: SERIES) { ...PersonPreviewCardBestMovies __typename } __typename } } fragment PersonPreviewCardBestMovies on PagingList_PersonBestMovie { items { movie { id title { russian original __typename } __typename } __typename } __typename }
